name: alx-frontend-javascript
description: `ES6, Promises, Classes, Data Manpulation, Typescript` ## About * This repository consist of Frontend Javascript projects done with [ALX Africa](https://www.alxafrica.com/). Full stack Software Engineering course in parnership with [Holberton School](https://www.holbertonschool.com/) by [Eric Nimba](https://github.com/nimba005) * `0x00: Introduction to ES6.` * `0x01: Promise (how, why, and what)` * `0x02: Classes and Metroprogramming.` * `0x03: Map, filter and reduce.` * 0x04: Types, Interfaces, Clasees, Functions.`
